claims.object: Describing the position of structures relative to each other

surface_layer.definition: Terms used to describe the position of structures relative to each other.
common_uses: Identifying the position of anatomical features

deep_layer.mechanism: Provides a standardized way to communicate anatomical relationships.
deep_layer.origin: Developed to avoid ambiguity in anatomical descriptions.

examples: Anterior, posterior, superior, inferior, medial, lateral

citations: Lab 1: Introduction to Human Anatomy & Anatomical Terminology
